sql.name: villagecommunicationpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: villagecommunication.group
villagecommunication.left
sql.item: select trim('(一)市区区域通信能力') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('市区基站数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('市区载频数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('市区话音信道数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('(二)县城城区区域通信能力') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('县城城区基站数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('县城城区载频数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('县城城区话音信道数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('(三)农村区域通信能力') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('农村基站数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('农村载频数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('农村话音信道数(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('表间关系验证:') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('基站数合计(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('载频数合计(个)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select trim('话音信道数合计(个)') as 指标名称 from dual

sql.name: villagecommunication.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('市区基站数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000016),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('市区载频数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('市区话音信道数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000018),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('县城城区基站数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('县城城区载频数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000020),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('县城城区话音信道数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('农村基站数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000022),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('农村载频数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000023),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('农村话音信道数(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000024),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('基站数合计(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000025),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('载频数合计(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000026),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('话音信道数合计(个)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000027),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
